website_summaries.verdict: If your child needs a swim helper that's a little more fun, try this shark kickboard from Melissa and Doug.
pros: Styrofoam board with colorful polyester casing
Colorfast fabric withstands chlorine and sun exposure
Helps develop gross motor skills and confidence in the water
cons: Fabric stains and shifts relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: The fabric gets moldy.  But the design is cute.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was moldy. The fabric was smooth and the design is cute and if it hadn't been moldy I'd have kept it, because I think that my son would like the fun shark style, and the small size is good for a preschooler to use for practicing swimming, kicking his legs. We were planning to use it while he was also wearing a float vest for swimming. Think about that it got moldy just from being new and dry prior to shipping, and this kick board is meant for use in water. Amazon has deleted my more detailed review twice so I am keeping it very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made for 7+YO, OR very tall younger children.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the large size. I shopped for an inexpensive “small child” kick board for a 3 & 5 yo. They are just a tiny bit smaller than a regular adult kick board. There are No Handles so the kids hold on to the bulging shark eyeballs. I’m sure they were created as holding spots. You have to spend $20-$30 for a mini kick board, these were $9.90. They arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: This kickboard is super cute! My 5 year old enjoyed using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This kickboard is super cute! My 5 year old enjoyed using it in the pool, and it is a great tool to help children learn to swim. My complaint is that after using in a chlorine pool and leaving it out standing in the sun to dry, the kickboard began to have brown mildew streaks all over it. I don't think it should stain so quickly. The design is not nearly as cute with the gross brown marks running down the board.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I originally bought it for my 2 year old daughter, not only does she love it but my older kids play with it as well. We have had it for about 2 months and take it to the pool and my youngest brings it in the bathtub with her. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: “Mr Sharkey” has held up really well. About a year old now.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday DeJong

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this paddle board in the pool this summer. Cuted shark design great for boys. We were practicing kicking in the water in this helped him balance. It's also great for kids to practice floating on their stomach rather than swimming in the upright position. We will use again next summer. This is great for a 2Or three-year-old. Bigger kids may need something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Melissa & Doug: A Family Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves Melissa & Doug products! Like many of their other products, the shark board does not miss a mark; our little one loves it. We use it at our pool and haul it to the beach frequently. The board is durable for our toddler and has withstood the wear and tear! Fantastic find!
customer_reviews.author: Family Adventure Shop

customer_reviews.title: Fierce Shark!
customer_reviews.text: Had him kicking away in the lazy river with this! Kiddo loved the shape & design of this kickboard/floatie & couldn't wait to get in the water to try it out. It's fun what can get a kid to try something that they might not have before. The shark did it for him & got to kicking & loved it. Worked as it should, cloth covered styro I believe, cloth dries super fast & held up being tossed & dragged about at the water park all summer. Fit into our beach bag easy enough & I think no one dared steal it when we left it laying about due to the fierce shark design! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults... not for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my 3 year old son. Unfortunately, it is a bit too buoyant for him to use. I'm 9 months pregnant and have taken it over. I love sitting on this while floating in the pool! I know that isn't its actual intention, but man, is it wonderful to float on!
customer_reviews.author: Jess P.

customer_reviews.title: Okayish
customer_reviews.text: Cute kickboard for my 3 year old, but it arrived with an unraveled corner. I don't feel like paying to send it back so we're just going to glue and pray instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This broke after the second time of use. These bumps under the material showed up and then it got weak and broke...almost like it wasnt water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the shark shape, and it helps her a lot learn swimming.
customer_reviews.author: yolandapankj

customer_reviews.title: Strong Perfume Smell
customer_reviews.text: Board is super cute however, almost sent it back because it reeks of perfume. When we opened the bag we were instantly assaulted by an overwhelming perfume stench. A bit disturbing, especially amid the COVID-19 crisis to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Danel

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Small and just fabric covering styrofoam. This has barely been used and the stitching is already coming apart at the seems. also for how small it is seems to be quite thick for little hands to hold on to. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much just a piece of styrofoam with a cute picture. I mean it works, but I highly doubt it will last more than a few uses. The stitching was already coming apart at the edges upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great for little swimmers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is just learning how to swim and she likes using this to practice kicking. They shark eyes are actually placed pretty well so we can tell her to "hold on to the eyes" to keep her hands up towards the front of the board.
customer_reviews.author: vbacc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It arrived looking like it had been chewed up in the corner. We’re leaving for the lake in a couple of days, so no time to return it. It will still work, but it’s disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son was doing swim classes and they had some of these. I ordered him one for our pool and he loves it. It seems sturdy and does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Esley Heizer

customer_reviews.title: Great kicking board for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: PROS - Cute - Good quality. Like most Melissa & Doug products, it was well made. It appears it will last a few seasons. - Size. The length from top to bottom fit my 4 year old son perfectly. - Boyancy is perfect for a toddler. I have been using this for a few weeks and I haven't found any cons yet.
customer_reviews.author: W Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This thing hold up incredibly well. We practically just always leave it in the pool and it’s still going strong after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good learning to swimming aid.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old this summer. He loves it. It’s held up really well. It helped him be more comfortable I feel like to get into the water in a swimming position to start learning to swim. It’s very cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom2

customer_reviews.title: Cute kickboard, good size
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kickboard. It's cute and the perfect size for my 5 year old. Good shape for him to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: SewGeekMama

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not practical for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 4 yr old niece to use during swimming lessons. The shape of the board (skinnier at the top) made it very difficult for her to balance and stay on the board. If ordering for a younger child, I suggest a paddle board that is equal width across the entire length. It will be easier for them to stay on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Weak quality
customer_reviews.text: My toddler snapped it in half on day one. It’s literally just foam no hard plastic over the foam like most boards.
customer_reviews.author: The Welch Family

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Broke on day 2
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Stuck to speedo kickboards. A little more money but they last. This thing cracked and broke on day 2 and left styrofoam in my pool. Ended up having to take the filter apart to clean it out! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Bethumms

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great float for my sons physical therapy treatment. It is sturdy and good quality for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious use
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. More as a cute board to play with than a funcional tool to use to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Brito

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half...
customer_reviews.text: The good news... It quickly improved the skills, technique and confidence of my 3-year old swimmer. The bad news... It snapped in half within 2 weeks of using it (my 9-yr old thought it'd be fun to jump onto it from the edge of the pool). And the seams are coming apart along the edges. I don't expect it to last much longer than a month or two. I'll buy a higher quality one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tompkinson 8

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching babies to
customer_reviews.text: Great for working with my 8 month old in the pool and getting comfortable in the water
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Fabric comes loose fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and the pattern is cute. But the fabric started to shift and come loose within a few weeks of light use. Think of it as a thin cover over a styrofoam board. It is not a pained design. I will have to throw it out soon. Next time I will go with one without a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmaven

customer_reviews.title: Low price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn't really expect it to be nice but it wasn't too bad. There's a small dip/dent in the middle and the styrofoam(?) sticks out at the end near the tag but it works and was at a really low price so I consider it a win. It works for adults too and helped my mom learn to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not good fabric
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it works ok, but the material started stretching and lifting from the board in just a hour of being in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Usually I’m pleased with M and D products. Not this one. The plastic type cover came off after a few uses. We thought it would be fun to use in the pool. Didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Doglover

customer_reviews.title: It held up just fine after several trips to the pool
customer_reviews.text: Kickboard shark doo doo doo doo doo doo... I couldn't get this diddy out of my head as my 8 year old used the kickboard in the pool during our weeklong vacation. It held up just fine after several trips to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: perfect design!
customer_reviews.text: oh! my child love it! he said - lets take shark with us to swim ))) so we use it all our vacation time :) bright design! light wait ! and perfect size (we are 5 y.o. - 114 cm).
customer_reviews.author: Tomik

customer_reviews.title: Great For a Beginning Swimmer
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this purchase. He had fun learning to swim with it.
customer_reviews.author: Azeem Zaidi

customer_reviews.title: We like this product
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. It is nice and my son enjoys it. However, I wish there was an option to have the tether strap like other boards made like this.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought, but it works out for the better. I use it for lap swimming and sitting on it for arm laps. My husband prefers it over the adult size board that we have because when he sits on it it doesn't hold him high out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very cute. My toddler hates it, but that's him, not the product :-/
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Nice cute and ok price but way way too small
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Cute and inexpensive but very very small. I must not have paid attention or if pics show next to something would give a better idea. We bought for our 8 year old and she isn't interested, too small.
customer_reviews.author: LolitaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for early swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves to swim with this. He has a lot more confidence in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: kal86

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: He's having such a good time with his new kick board! They just got a pool and he's getting use out his new shark friend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fran from Chatham

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 3 year old is loving it and learning so much!
customer_reviews.author: liltzmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 4 year old beginner swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 4 year old son. He’s a beginner swimmer but was able to figure out how to float with this shark kick board. He used it all summer and is in perfect condition still.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Rich

customer_reviews.title: Unique and functional
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old granddaughter is learning to swim, and she loves this kick board!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie809

customer_reviews.title: Very little flotation.
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son easily sinks this limiting the use to this. Tried it a few times then left it at the community pool
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: This little bored is a great helper for kids learning how to swim. My daughter thought it was funny being a shark and enjoyed using it to help practice her kicks in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for learning to swim. My grandsons love them
customer_reviews.author: lisa behm

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice but i suspect the inside is the traditional Styrofoam ...
customer_reviews.text: it looks nice but i suspect the inside is the traditional Styrofoam material.. for the price is ok.. wont spend more on it... useful for basic swim classes and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cover is already bunching up after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Conforth Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it! Perfect size for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Great for teaching my toddler how to kick his legs in the pool. The fun shark cover is a big hit with him and it keeps him from picking apart the foam underneath. I would definitely would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!! Not too small!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this wouldn't be too small for my 7 year old son and it isn't! It's perfect! And even looks better in person than in this picture. Very sturdy, and easy for him to grip/hold while practicing his swimming techniques and just general pool fun. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Everest

customer_reviews.title: Fun design great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kick board for those starting to learn to swim. Its not made as a floatation device but for the child to hold onto while kicking. My son is a decent swimmer now and still loves to play with this in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon & Chris Faerman

customer_reviews.title: AAAA++++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product does what it is supposed to do at a reasonable price. AAAA++++
customer_reviews.author: J. Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddlers learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good quality. Perfect for my toddlres who are learning to swim!
customer_reviews.author: Alethea

customer_reviews.title: The shape isn't that great, I use it with my 4 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: It's essentially a fabric covered foam board. The shape isn't that great, I use it with my 4 yr old and he doesn't really like the way it feels so we don't use it often. It performs as advertised, but the shape and fabric cover detracts a bit
customer_reviews.author: Cowala

customer_reviews.title: Friendly shark attack for the win!
customer_reviews.text: This board is so cute! The colors are bright and it works so well for my almost 3 yr old. I believe it was a steal for the price :-) Thanks Melissa and Doug for another quality product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Good for the price. It's the perfect size for a toddler. My 2 year old wears puddle-jumpers and can't quite use this with them on, but I think it'd be great for 3-5 year olds who are learning to swim.
customer_reviews.author: This Happy Homeschool

customer_reviews.title: I personally felt like it’s way too small
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it . I personally felt like it’s way too small, but he seems to enjoy it so far !
customer_reviews.author: Yawei H

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson to play in his pool, at two years old he is still a bit too young to use it like a kick-board.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Border

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: PRO cute and my kids liked the design CON it broke after a couple times in the pool. Cheap product that doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 yr old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Perfect size for our 5 yr old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Midge Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kickboard!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these fun shark kick boards! We don’t lose them at the pool, because of the cute shark design. And they’re sturdy enough for big and little kids to use!
customer_reviews.author: lauren cleland

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold much weight afloat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He’s 3 but unfortunately it doesn’t really keep weight afloat.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I love this because unlike other kickboards
customer_reviews.text: I love this because unlike other kickboards, it doesn't have the warning labels all over it. It's just a cute design and works well for my boys who are between 6 and 10 years f age.
customer_reviews.author: thunification

customer_reviews.title: It's a shark. It floats. And you can ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a shark. It floats. And you can use it to splash someone or safely wade around the pool. It does as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kickboard
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kickboard, my son loves it. Not the sturdiest of kickboards so if you are looking for something for competitive swimming I would go a different route. We used it for our four year old swimmer, in a home pool. It's held up all summer and it has been used and abused. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for little guys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old who is learning to swim. So far he just jumps on it in the shallow end but it is easy for him to hold on to and I'm hoping it will help him more next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Teach82

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 ye old was learning to swim and he would hang on to this when he got tired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and good price
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this product! Lots of fun and good price! John 3:16
customer_reviews.author: Romans 10:9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fades quick but helped me teach my son to swim over the summer so who cares.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It is material over foam but I consider it a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this kickboard. We've only taken it to the beach once, but oddly enough she'll take it out and carry it around the house. It is material over foam but I consider it a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Jaws
customer_reviews.text: SUPER cute... even though my son thought it was a monster in the middle of the night. He likes sharks, so it was a hit besides at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Booklover

customer_reviews.title: So fun.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves his shark kickborad. Holding up great after a summer with a lot of swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Is Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works okay for small, and I mean really small children. Wish it was slightly larger and more buoyant.
customer_reviews.author: Gylmeh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Board
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it. They love sharks and dinosaurs, so it was great.
customer_reviews.author: LaV

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 year old son, he's fairly big for his age, normally fits in 6-7 year clothes, and this kickboard fits him perfectly. We bought this to help with his swimming lessons. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not one of the most durable Melissa and Doug ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not one of the most durable Melissa and Doug products - it's already stretching away and tearing from very minimal use. However, it's cute...
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Bought it as a birthday gift and my friend's son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I will give it that. But, it's not very sturdy or easy for a child to hang on to. I was looking for a little bit more when I bought this. It was a birthday present for my son. He loved it for about the first ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Leitch

customer_reviews.title: Good kickboard for a toddler - little kid
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Smaller than expected but I probably didn't read the dimensions. Good kickboard for a toddler - little kid.
customer_reviews.author: EmG

customer_reviews.title: Kickboard Gives the Side-eye
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because of its 5 star reviews. Straight out of the box the print was off center and the bottom has a spot where the Styrofoam pokes out of the seam. This is visible in the photo next to the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Parker

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: He is using it in the hot tub right now waiting for his large pool to get put up. He tells me he is practicing. The color is so bright and actually makes you giggle with the shark smiling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blue outer cover is ripped in few places. Probably is not going to last long
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Light but bouyant
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, so it is easy for my 3 year old nephew to use but also buoyant enough to hold up my 200lb pregnant body!

customer_reviews.title: yeah, let's go swimming!
customer_reviews.text: my little granddaughter enjoyed this so much she brought out of the pool and into the TV room to snuggle on! Safe, not tippy!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love this kick board
customer_reviews.text: Love this kick board. Perfect size for my four year old!! We have fun pretending the shark is after us.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but I was hoping the board would not be covered in material.

customer_reviews.title: These are so much fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun for the kids, but they crack in the middle, so they do not last more than a season. We still like them.
customer_reviews.author: V.  P. Spasic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Fresh out of the package and the material was already bubbling up. Material is very thin and rips easily. I would choose another.

customer_reviews.title: Cute board for my son
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for our new pool. He likes it. It's very cute and serves it's function.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, ordered these for a class at work and the suited our needs just fine. I would order these again but I don't think they would last long in full time pool use.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came with some small flaws but nothing that affected it's functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Nickell

customer_reviews.title: The only way you can go wrong with a kickboard is if you sink with it...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a child learning to swim and have fun with it. It is a kickboard, how can you go wrong with it. (It is actually a tight cloth covering the styrofoam.)
customer_reviews.author: paxhungaria

customer_reviews.title: kick board
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are a strange adult, this isn't your kickboard, but if you're a kid under 10, this is the one you prefer. Well done graphics and strong enough to stand up to kid's pool play.
customer_reviews.author: retiredprof

customer_reviews.title: Okay price and perfect size for the fearful toddler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help my 3 yr old with his swim lessons. Decent price, quick delivery, cool design, and has held up well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Crappy item in Amazon choice
customer_reviews.text: Crappy item in Amazon choice. The styrofome inside is pulvarized easily
customer_reviews.author: NINAD PIMPARKAR

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and it's a nice shape -- easy to hold and use in the water. Both my nephews -- 6 and 10 -- really like this board in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Spark Shark Kickboard
product_meta.description:
Young swimmers will be motivated to power through the pool with Spark Shark to help! Beginners can hold onto this tough, fabric-coated kickboard as they gain confidence; older swimmers will love using it for games and exercise.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: A colorful kickboard to help children learn to swim
Styrofoam board with colorful polyester casing
Colorfast fabric withstands chlorine and sun exposure.
Spark Shark character adds a splash of whimsy.
Perfect for developing gross motor skills and confidence in the pool!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars930 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
